text: يَـٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تُحَآجُّونَ فِيٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَتِ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةُ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلُ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

translation.en: O People of the Scripture, why do you argue about Abraham while the Torah and the Gospel were not revealed until after him? Then will you not reason
translation.id: (Wahai Ahli Kitab! Mengapa kamu berbantah-bantahan122) tentang Ibrahim, padahal Taurat dan Injil diturunkan setelah dia (Ibrahim)? Apakah kamu tidak mengerti
